m_descr: Allows accessing EnOcean devices from attached EnOcean transceiver.
h_name: Should be a valid JS key string. Don't change unless you know what you are doing
h_enableAPI: Handler HTTP requests to /EnOcean/* and /EnOcean/<internal zway name>/*
rl_publicAPI: Allow public access to EnOcean API
h_publicAPI: Do not ask for authentication to access EnOcean API
rl_createVDev: Create virtual devices in Home Automation engine
h_createVDev: Without this EnOcean devices will be visible only in Expert UI and via EnOcean API
h_change_sth: Don't change unless you know what you are doing
